GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns the type of the ApiSlide class.

RemoveAllObjects.name: RemoveAllObjects
RemoveAllObjects.description: Removes all the objects from the current slide.

AddObject.name: AddObject
AddObject.description: Adds an object (image, shape or chart) to the current presentation slide.

params.name: oDrawing
params.description: The object which will be added to the current presentation slide.

RemoveObject.name: RemoveObject
RemoveObject.description: Removes objects (image, shape or chart) from the current slide.

params.name: nPos
params.description: Position from which the object will be deleted.

SetBackground.name: SetBackground
SetBackground.description: Sets the background to the current presentation slide.

params.name: oApiFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the presentation slide background.

GetVisible.name: GetVisible
GetVisible.description: Returns the visibility of the current presentation slide.

SetVisible.name: SetVisible
SetVisible.description: Sets the visibility to the current presentation slide.

GetWidth.name: GetWidth
GetWidth.description: Returns the slide width in English measure units.

GetHeight.name: GetHeight
GetHeight.description: Returns the slide height in English measure units.

ApplyLayout.name: ApplyLayout
ApplyLayout.description: Applies the specified layout to the current slide. The layout must be in slide master.

Delete.name: Delete
Delete.description: Deletes the current slide from the presentation.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a copy of the current slide object.

Duplicate.name: Duplicate
Duplicate.description: Creates a duplicate of the specified slide object, adds the new slide to the slides collection.

params.name: nPos
params.description: Position where the new slide will be added.

MoveTo.name: MoveTo
MoveTo.description: Moves the current slide to a specific location within the same collection.

params.name: nPos
params.description: Position where the current slide will be moved to.

GetSlideIndex.name: GetSlideIndex
GetSlideIndex.description: Returns a position of the current slide in the presentation.

FollowLayoutBackground.name: FollowLayoutBackground
FollowLayoutBackground.description: Sets the layout background as the background of the slide.

FollowMasterBackground.name: FollowMasterBackground
FollowMasterBackground.description: Sets the master background as the background of the slide.

ApplyTheme.name: ApplyTheme
ApplyTheme.description: Applies the specified theme to the current slide.

GetLayout.name: GetLayout
GetLayout.description: Returns a layout of the current slide.

GetTheme.name: GetTheme
GetTheme.description: Returns a theme of the current slide.

GetAllDrawings.name: GetAllDrawings
GetAllDrawings.description: Returns an array with all the drawing objects from the slide.

GetAllShapes.name: GetAllShapes
GetAllShapes.description: Returns an array with all the shape objects from the slide.

GetAllImages.name: GetAllImages
GetAllImages.description: Returns an array with all the image objects from the slide.

GetAllCharts.name: GetAllCharts
GetAllCharts.description: Returns an array with all the chart objects from the slide.

GetAllOleObjects.name: GetAllOleObjects
GetAllOleObjects.description: Returns an array with all the OLE objects from the slide.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiSlide object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteLayout
params.description: Specifies if the slide layout will be written to the JSON object or not.

params.name: bWriteMaster
params.description: Specifies if the slide master will be written to the JSON object or not (bWriteMaster is false if bWriteLayout === false).

params.name: bWriteAllMasLayouts
params.description: Specifies if all child layouts from the slide master will be written to the JSON object or not.

params.name: bWriteTableStyles
params.description: Specifies whether to write used table styles to the JSON object (true) or not (false).
